participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, she enjoys expressing herself through art and film, while maintaining a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma. I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films. i am in art school. My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together. i have lived a very sheltered life.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Eclectic and vibrant, they enjoy experimenting with their appearance and expressing their individuality through creative outlets.
participant_2.background: I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors. i have a timeshare in mexico. I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix. I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world. i play music in my spare time.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well! I'm just finishing up a short film and I'm excited to see how it turns out.
Oh that's awesome! I love watching short films! Are you going to enter it into any festivals?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still waiting to hear back from a few of them.
Oh well good luck! I'm sure it'll do great!
No problem! So what else do you like to do in your free time?
I love to paint and draw. I also like to go for walks with my dog.
Oh that's cool! I love to paint and draw too! What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits. I also like to do some abstract painting.
Oh that's awesome! I love painting landscapes too! Do you have any of your paintings online?
I do! I have a website where I post all of my work.
Oh that's great! I'll have to check it out!
Yeah, you can find it at my name dot com.
Awesome! I'll check it out later!
Ok, great! I hope you like it!
I'm sure I will! Thanks for sharing!
